Title: Requires certain training for all retailers, dealers and sellers of firearms in New York state
Summary: Requires training on how to identify illegal purchasers of firearms for all retailers, dealers and sellers of firearms in New York state; directs the state police to implement such program; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง898-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certain required training for all retailers, dealers and sellers of firearms in New York state
